page.title: 10EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Farming provides the main employment in the block.There is also a Fuchsia Nursery in Willey village it has over 400 varieties. Bitteswell Airport provides some employment which could increase in the future. There is also the pub in Willey & the motel on Watlihg Street. Many teenagers need to find work away from the area as farming is needing less employees as it becomes more and more mechanised. Adjacent to the Airport is a modern firm called 'Semelab' who check electrical equipment,especially silicon chips,for faults.
